call_reason: AutoMow Mini shuts down randomly while mowing.
details: Customer reported that the AutoMow Mini had powered off mid-mow for the first time. Initially assumed to be user error or a one-off fault. Customer was asked to observe further and report back if issue persists. Promised resolution if problem reoccurred within the week.

call_reason: AutoMow Mini shut down again mid-use.
details: Customer followed up to say the mower shut off again. We began a basic diagnostics process but did not escalate yet. Informed customer to keep device running under observation. Estimated resolution by early next week.

call_reason: Still having the same AutoMow Mini shutdown issue.
details: Customer expressed growing frustration as the mower continued shutting off. Noted that issue is now clearly persistent. Escalation initiated to product support team. Promised an update within 3 working days.

call_reason: My AutoMow Mini still keeps turning off while mowing.
